name: Celestrix
otherNightReminder: If the Celestrix's team is losing, the Celestrix points to two players. Otherwise: the Celestrix chooses one player.
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If the Storyteller believes your team is losing, you may choose 2.
flavor: Just when they think they've got the upper-hand, I come back stronger. Watching that light fade from their eyes gives me life. It gives me purpose...
